response.overview: In a dystopian future where aliens have conquered Earth, the last surviving humans are kept as exotic pets. For their mastersâ€™ entertainment, some are forced into a deadly competition known as Alien Stage, where they must sing and perform to survive. Each round, the loser is executed for the amusement of the alien audience. Tensions run high as contestants are forced to face their previous emotional bonds, knowing that every performance could be their last, and caring for each other might just be their downfall.
response.title: Alien Stage
